personalInfo.name: Tayyub Yaqoob
personalInfo.title: Digital Analyst | AI/ML Solutions Engineer | Data & Crypto Enthusiast
personalInfo.summary: I am a Digital Analyst with over 5 years of experience in analytics, automation, and AI/ML. I build scalable data pipelines, forecasting engines, anomaly detection systems, and crypto/DeFi insights. Beyond my role at 8 Million Stories, I freelance as a data consultant and write for Cointelegraph, while also pursuing FIRE through structured investing.

experience.title: Digital Analyst
experience.description: Lead analytics and AI/ML initiatives across organic and paid media teams. Deliver automation, forecasting, MMM, and anomaly detection solutions for major clients.
achievements: Built 6 AI/ML Codex modules (Forecasting, Query Forecast, Sitemap Analysis, Anomaly Detection, Synergy Analysis, Sentiment Analysis).
Designed GA4 + BigQuery data pipelines with full automation.
Implemented Advanced Consent Mode V2, GA4 audits, and GTM RegEx automations.
Delivered Codex AI platform modules for 50+ global clients including BBC, Tesco Bank, and Gleneagles.

experience.title: Data & AI Consultant
experience.description: Delivering advanced data workflows, cloud deployments, and custom AI/ML models for agencies and businesses.
achievements: Scaled client-specific workloads using AWS Lambda, Fargate, and EC2.
Automated GA4 + CRM integrations with Supermetrics & BigQuery.
Built Looker Studio dashboards and MMM optimizations for paid media clients.

experience.title: Contributor (as Callum Reid)
experience.description: Writing deep-dive articles on AI, crypto, and DeFi trends.
achievements: Published 25+ AI-crypto strategy guides with global readership.
Specialized in AI-powered crypto trading bots, stablecoin depegging analysis, and DeFi fraud prevention.
Content structured to match Cointelegraph‚Äôs editorial standards and SEO updates.

projects.title: Codex AI Modules
projects.description: A suite of 6 AI/ML modules: forecasting, anomaly detection, sentiment analysis, sitemap similarity, query forecasting, and synergy analysis ‚Äî deployed for 50+ clients.

projects.title: Marketing Mix Modeling (Vertex AI)
projects.description: MMM budget optimization model built on Vertex AI, using holdout validation and predictive simulations to guide media spend decisions.

projects.title: Crypto & AI Writing (Cointelegraph)
projects.description: Wrote 25+ long-form research-backed articles on AI in crypto, DeFi, and stablecoins under the editorial pseudonym Callum Reid.

projects.title: Investment Journey (PSX & FIRE Plan)
projects.description: Actively investing in PSX with index funds and dividend stocks, while targeting FIRE by age 35. Portfolio includes EFERT, MIIETF, and MZNPETF. Strategy combines reinvested dividends, long-term growth, and monthly contributions.

projects.title: SaaS Side Projects
projects.description: Developing multiple SaaS/side projects including a CV builder, AI tools aggregator, and free-online-games portal with affiliate integrations.

insights.learningFocus: Health data science and NHS tech integration
insights.careerTrajectory: Transitioning from marketing analytics to health data science with a focus on NHS digital tools and clinical AI.
